resources.string: Make a difference and contribute today!
Every year thousands of animals get into shelters where they have complicated live.
By adoption, you\'re helping make space for another animal in need and giving them an opportunity to become beloved pets.
Shelter pets have so much love to give and they won\'t ever stop giving it to you once you let them into your heart.
The best breed are the ones in need!

He loves being with his brother squeaky. Both were owner surrender to humane society since owner could not keep because apartment complex would not allow. Escape artist and will look for a way out to run and play! JUMPERS, CAN JUMP HIGH!!
She is very smart! She knows sit and shake and is even crate trained! Arthur loves dogs but is not cat tested. She is a dog who wants to please his humans and is very sweet!!

She is a very shy girl that will need time to come out of her shell. Loud noises while walking do make her nervous so a confident and experienced owner is important. Since She is nervous with new things.
